member.name: M:BaseCmdConsoleInit(BYTE,PCMDENTRY,BYTE)
member.summary: This function initialize the command console.
member.param: Specifies the serial port to use for the command console.
Points to the project specific console command table.
Specifies the size of the command table.

member.name: M:BaseCmdConsoleTrace(void)
member.summary: This function processes the periodic traces.
member.returns: Always returns TRUE so it will be called next time.

member.name: M:PrintStatus(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints system status info.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:PrintRCIoData(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints the RC I/O data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:PrintPwmData(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints the PWM data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:PrintAdcData(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints the A/D converter data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:PrintEncoderData(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints the Encoder data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:PrintGyroData(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function prints the Gyro data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.summary: This function prints the OI input data.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:CalibrateGyro(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function initiates a gyro calibration.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).

member.name: M:CalibrateInput(PCMDENTRY)
member.summary: This function initiates an input calibration.
member.param: Points to the command table entry (not used).
